posts.author: CookieMonster
posts.content:
Hello there all, I was recommended to this website by a friend who suggested you guys be pretty damn amazing at what you do.

My friend plays on Arelith using a Monk / Cleric build and I would really like to have something similar to RP with him, only thing is, he guessed his build and by blind luck it happened to be pretty strong so he just kept it as it was.

I was hoping for something a little bit more planned though?

The Concept I had in mind was as follows

Human Monk / Cleric, Dual Kama with Epic Spell Focus Evo, Greater Ruin and Hellball. The two epic spells and epic focus, because on Arelith when combined the GRuin hits up to 500 DMG and the Hellball can clean out 600 DMG to a huge area.
